dcterms:description: A large database of handwritten digits (0,1,...,9), containing 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images. These are monochrome images with an intensity in the interval [0, 255] and the size of 28 × 28 pixels. The MNIST dataset is probably the most frequently used benchmark in image recognition.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset
